author: jlidrych
body:
#### PR description:

Increases the max number of strip clusters for Cosmics tracking.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. 

Backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47577
title: [15.0.X]Increase threshold of max number of strips clusters for cosmics
